attributes.action: To not hold a general election in 2007 Patricia Clothier
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think this whole frenzy is led by our media with Mr Camaron and His partys self interest in power, paramount. The british public should be respected for their ability to make up our own minds without being swept by hysteria.
I am a floating voter not a member of any political party and am swayed by actions, not confrontational barraging. I wouldn't accept that from anyone in my personal life why should I want it from the Goverment of my country.
Come on anti electioners .Say No.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
